languages.text: "...Естественно. Это банальный здравый смысл". {n}Кажется, ваши слова настолько удивляют Соломона, что недоумение на миг подавляет терзающие его чувства.{/n}
"Of course. That's just common sense." {n}Your words seem to surprise Solomorne to the point that his bafflement drowns out his roiling emotions for a moment.{/n}

languages.text: « Évidemment. Cela relève tout simplement du bon sens. » {n}Votre commentaire le laisse pantois, à tel point que son étonnement prend le pas sur son angoisse l'espace d'un instant.{/n}

languages.text: 「当然です。常識ですよ」{n}あなたの言葉にソロモーンは驚き、戸惑いが渦巻く感情を一瞬だけ押し流してしまったようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. That's just common sense." {n}Your words seem to surprise Solomorne to the point that his bafflement drowns out his roiling emotions for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「当然です。常識ですよ」{n}あなたの言葉にソロモーンは驚き、戸惑いが渦巻く感情を一瞬だけ押し流してしまったようだった。{/n}
「当然です」{n}あなたの問いかけに、ソロモーンはひどく驚いたようだった。戸惑いが激しい感情を一瞬だけ押し流してしまった。{/n}
「当然です」{n}あなたの問いかけに、ソロモーンはひどく驚いたようだった。戸惑いが激しい感情を一瞬だけ押し流してしまった。{/n}

languages.text: «Por supuesto. Es de sentido común». {n}Tus palabras sorprenden tanto a Solomorne que, por un momento, su perplejidad sofoca las demás emociones que siente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. That's just common sense." {n}Your words seem to surprise Solomorne to the point that his bafflement drowns out his roiling emotions for a moment.{/n}

languages.text: “当然了，这是常识。”{n}你的话问题似乎让索罗蒙困惑不已，他一时之间甚至忘记了愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. That's just common sense." {n}Your words seem to surprise Solomorne to the point that his bafflement drowns out his roiling emotions for a moment.{/n}

languages.text: "Tabii ki. Sağduyu bunu gerektirir." {n}Sözlerini duyunca afallayan Solomorne'un içinde kopan fırtınalar, bir anlığına şaşkınlığının gölgesinde kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. That's just common sense." {n}Your words seem to surprise Solomorne to the point that his bafflement drowns out his roiling emotions for a moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki. Sağduyu bunu gerektirir." {n}Sözlerini duyunca afallayan Solomorne'un içinde kopan fırtınalar, bir anlığına şaşkınlığının gölgesinde kalıyor.{/n}
"Tabii ki." {n}Solomorne, sorunla o kadar afallıyor ki içinde kopan fırtınalar, bir anlığına şaşkınlığının gölgesinde kalıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Natürlich. Das ist einfach nur vernünftig." {n}Deine Worte scheinen Solomorne so sehr zu überraschen, dass seine Verblüffung seine aufgewühlten Gefühle für einen Moment unterdrückt.{/n}

"Natürlich." {n}Deine Frage scheint Solomorne derart zu überraschen, dass seine Verblüffung für einen kurzen Moment seine aufgewühlten Gefühle überdeckt.{/n}
